title: Cosens revived, or, The French-accademy containing examples of the fundamental rules of drawing, and directions for the assistants of young practitioners in that most noble and ingenious art : likewise, the use of the necessary instruments for drawing ... : also instructions for pasting, colouring or washing maps and prints ...: lastly, directions for preparing mezotincto prints ...
publisher: Printed by W. Wilde, for Robert Walton ...,
